# Fidjoo - Creative Storytelling App for Children

> Fidjoo is a creative app where children ages 5-12 turn simple choices into their own animated storybooks. It transforms passive screen time into meaningful, imaginative play through safe, ad-free, family-centered experiences.

## About Fidjoo

Fidjoo helps children build stories by making simple choices â€” hero, world, challenge, and ending. Every choice transforms the story, helping kids understand cause and effect while developing creativity, decision-making, and storytelling skills.

### Key Features
- **Build-Your-Own Stories**: Children shape their narrative through guided choices
- **Family Co-Creation**: Designed for parents and kids to create together
- **Safe & Kid-Friendly**: 100% ad-free, private, and age-appropriate content
- **Offline Support**: Created stories can be enjoyed offline anytime
- **Story Prompts**: Simple suggestions help children who don't know how to begin
- **Listen & Share**: Children can listen to completed stories or share with family

### Target Audience
- Children aged 5-12
- Parents seeking meaningful screen time alternatives
- Families who want to create together

## Pricing

Fidjoo offers flexible pricing options:

### Subscriptions
- **Family Starter**: $9.99/month - 12 credits (~4 stories)
- **Premium Creator**: $24.99/month - 22 credits (~7 stories)

### Credit Packs (One-Time Purchase)
- **Mini Pack**: $8.99 - 10 credits (~3 stories)
- **Standard Pack**: $16.99 - 20 credits (~6 stories)
- **Large Pack**: $34.99 - 35 credits (~11 stories)

## Product

- [Homepage](https://fidjoo.app/): Main landing page with features overview
- [Pricing](https://fidjoo.app/#pricing): Subscription plans and credit packs
- [FAQ](https://fidjoo.app/#faq): Frequently asked questions

## FAQ

**Is Fidjoo safe for children?**
Fidjoo is 100% ad-free and built as a closed, kid-friendly environment. All creations stay private and fully supervised by parents.

**What ages is Fidjoo designed for?**
Fidjoo is ideal for children aged 5 to 12, with stories and experiences adapted to different reading and developmental levels.

**Does Fidjoo work offline?**
Yes. Once a story is created, it can be enjoyed offline anytime. A connection is only needed for creating or customizing new stories.

**How much does Fidjoo cost?**
You can start for free with one story. Then, flexible subscriptions and credit packs allow families to choose the option that fits them best.
